author: Jonathan Morrow
comment: Files, Settings, Help are not on the screen. Tried reinstalling and rebooting my phone twice. Right now the app is useless.

reply.author: Krugism Development LLC
reply.content: The menu now slides out from the left side of the screen. Swipe from the left or simply tap the LED bar on the top.

author: Kevin Brick
comment: If you are looking for a para app that is easy, fun, and has lots of OMG! potential, this is not the app for you. This is a researchers tool for geeks and analytical folks. The only REAL para app on google play. Extremely boring app if no spirits are around. (Which is usually). Even the graphics are real boring, with a third of your screen blacked out. Tons of features, upgrades are great and inexpensive. Only .99 for the YES/NO commo feature. The dev keeps coming up with new inventions, too. Very advanced.
title: An app for the researcher

author: Jennifer B
comment: I was at my mom's house. When it got really cold around me. And my mom's dog looked up and started barking. I got a 12000 magus reading. Something was definitely there!!!
title: I like it

author: A Google User
comment: This is worth it. I bought all add ons at the time. I was skeptical, until I used it. I got some kind of sound that sounded like a pencil scribbling on paper with occasional tapping sounds mixed in with it. It lasted about 2 full minutes! Try it.  ***update*** I haven't captured anything since that day, which makes me believe in it even more. :-)

author: Albert Magno
comment: I have the best apps and tools for watching, looking, "hunting"..I have lost someone and do believe in paranormal entities. You put together a great app some things are nice but others especially the add on purchase media and the EVP are fake and offensive. Especially when you take a pic hoping to see an entity and it's a bad pic of an ugly ghost creature..cmon...work on it..wish I could get a refund but I'll still use it for some things.. thanks with all.due respect

reply.author: Krugism Development LLC
reply.content: I'm glad you enjoy the app. The EVP and the camera ONLY record actual audio and video without any processing or manipulation. It's just a way to record while you see the EMF.

title: A joke but can't give u less than 3

comment: I work in an antique mall in Denison Texas and have captured several very high EMF detections and some very freaky voices and noises. The local news has come down to do a segment of the ghostly spirits that inhabit our building. During the segment I showed them my app that I use to detect the spirits in the building which is the Entity Sensor Pro.

author: Ghost Hunter
comment: Excellent ghost hunting app. One of the best. Very sensitive, with history graph recording capability. And I strongly suggest buying the in-app add-ons. They are worth it. For any serious ghost hunter, highly recommended. *UPDATE*  Last night I ran ESP app all night while sleeping in bedroom. At around 2:20am, emf triggered- only once all night. Woke up this morning and living room clock was stopped- at 2:23am! Dead battery was not the cause. Reinserted battery and clock is fine. Awesome!
title: The real deal

author: trag1c h3ro
comment: I purchased the app a long time ago. Every time I try to use it, it says it's not a licensed version and I need to buy it. When I hit the buy button, it takes me to the plays store and gives me the option to uninstall or to open... How does this get resolved? I already purchased the app. I would like to be able to use it.

reply.author: Krugism Development LLC
reply.content:
Please make sure you are using the same Play store user as when you originally purchased the app.
You can see this for more information: https://support.google.com/googleplay/answer/113410?hl=en

title: Says I need to buy it...

author: A Google User
comment: Being totally honest, I was able to pick up activity using this at a gravesite in Central City Cemetery. I met other people who had a K2 meter and they had activity also.
title: Activity

author: Michael Hill
comment: App says yes or no by tilting phone in differant directions.. also changes emf reading when phone is tilted....why????

reply.author: Krugism Development LLC
reply.content: The Q/A optional module detects the EMF on the sides of the phone. So higher EMF on the left will be for Yes, on the right for No. When you tilt your phone, that changes the EMF that's read using the sensor, and it will cause the Yes/No to display. You can get more info at our website here: [http://www.krugism.com/esp_opt_qa.aspx]

title: Confused

author: Anneck Cranke
comment: Interesting the emf reading goes through the roof right next to the steering wheel inside my car while the air conditioning is on. And I don't think my car is haunted.

reply.author: Krugism Development LLC
reply.content: Since the app uses the Magnetic Sensor (Compass Sensor), any large metallic or electronic devices can make the sensor values higher. Your dash would have both of those. See the http://krugism.com site for more info.
